attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1 it does request action, it requests for the birmingham city council to collect recycleables weekly from peoples houses, in special recycleable bags of different colours as other districts do such as worcester.

2 This is completely within the powers of the government as local waste disposal, IE bin collection is completely goverment controlled so there is no reason you should be able to reject this petition going through based on the reasons you stated it was rejected.

Districts around Birmingham such as Worcester have the council collect recyclables in separate coloured bags for  things such as plastics, papers, etc.  This petition is for the Birmingham council to collect recyclables in a similar manner.  

Such a large city would make a huge impact on the environment for the better by recycling being encouraged in this manner.

rejection.details: E-petitions are for the attention of the PM and HM Government, not individual city councils. Please approach the council in question or reword your petition title accordingly.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
